Service update

Virgin Trains off peak ticket restrictions lifted

Following recent disruption caused by poor weather conditions, Virgin Trains customers with 'off-peak' tickets may use these on any train at any time of day. This will continue throughout the Christmas and New Year holiday period, up to and including Monday 3 January 2011.
